document_data.caption: A map of Malatra showing the Kuong Kingdom in the south. Javuhansa lies in the southwestern hills.
document_data.name: Javuhansa
document_data.mainbody: '''Javuhansa''' was a town in the [[Kuong Kingdom]] in [[Malatra]].
document_data.Geography: Javuhansa lay at the source of the [[Kunong River]],<ref group="note">Like many locations in the Kuong Kingdom, Javuhansa has not been labelled on any map of Malatra. However, it is known to be on the headwaters (source) of the Kunong River, which, based on descriptions, is most likely the river from the central hill country and joining the [[Fenghsintzu River]]. It stood at the northern end of the [[Trade road (Kuong Kingdom)|trade road]] to the south, which passed through [[Enlasre]] south of Javuhansa.
document_data.Trade:
[[Gold]] and [[ivory]] collected in the southern jungles were carried north via caravan to Javuhansa in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. These goods were sold in its open markets.

More notably, Javuhansa was the best place to get imported [[herb]]s, [[spices]], and [[:Category:Medicines|medicinal plants]] in all of [[Malatra]]. These were expensive and often rare, even magical.
